title: Ordinance relating to salaries of the Office of the Recorder of Deeds

abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL NO. 114   INTRODUCED BY ALDERMAN LARRY ARNOWITZ An ordinance relating to the employees and salaries of the Office of the Recorder of Deeds; repealing Ordinances  #69192  approved pertaining to the office of the Recorder of Deeds and enacting in lieu thereof a new ordinance pertaining to the same subject matter and containing an emergency clause.
